info.task: navigate backwards to a switch in the on state
info.title: Navigate backwards to a switch in the on state in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the switch, and sets the switch state to 'on'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
